faq.title: Questions about Towing Service Direct?
faq.description: Everything you want to know about our services and working method

items.question: How fast can you be on location?
items.answer: On average we are on location within 30 minutes in Amsterdam and immediate surroundings. We always strive to be as fast as possible, especially in emergency situations.

items.question: Which vehicles can you tow?
items.answer: We tow passenger cars, vans (up to and including L1), and small commercial vehicles. Whether it's an electric car, automatic or manual transmission - we have the right equipment.

items.question: Do you work with leasing companies?
items.answer: Yes, we work structurally with multiple leasing companies, garages and damage companies. We know their procedures and ensure correct handling.

items.question: Are you available 24/7?
items.answer: Yes, we are available day and night. Whether it's in the middle of the night or during a holiday - we're ready to help with breakdowns or damage.

items.question: What about insurance?
items.answer: Every transport is fully insured. We work according to all safety standards and protocols, and our drivers are certified and experienced.

items.question: Can you move my car without damage?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use modern tow trucks with professional tools such as wheel dollies and tie-down straps. Damage-free transport is our priority.
